description: Stop motion shorts that feature dolls in a surreal world for girls.

REGULAR.description:
The story takes place in a certain ordinary town where it is natural for everyone to wear an animal costume head. It depicts the everyday life of the main character MILPOM and her friends who live there, filled with the essence of Kawaii and a little bit cynical girls.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Pumpkin Pie Is Hard to Say!
Pumpkin Piette Ii Nikui yo ne!
パンプキンパイっていいにくいよね!

REGULAR.description:
When Christmas is fast approaching, MILPOM and her friends visit the nail salon that HAPPY recommends. They wait for their turn too long and an unexpected happening occurs!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shichimenchoutte Donna Tori ka Yoku Wakannai yo ne!
What Kind of Bird Is a Turkey Anyway?!
七面鳥ってどんな鳥かよくわかんないよね!

REGULAR.description:
SILKY, CACAO, and HAPPY visit the café where MILPOM works part-time. They chat about their ideal type of men, which turns into a crazy girl talk!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Suki ni Natta Hito ga Type Desutte Sore ga Toshidensetsu Da yo ne?
Your Type Is Up to Who You Fall For. Is That an Urban Legend?
好きになった人がタイプですってそれ都市伝説だよね?

REGULAR.description:
MILPOM, SILKY, CACAO and HAPPY unveil their ambitions, one-by-one, as they’re interviewed on the street in Harajuku…!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Isn`t It a Reality That You`ll Be Likened to a Smartmouthed Adolescent If You Speak of Your Dreams and That You`ll be Shunned for Being Snobbish If You Talk About Your Future?
Yume o Kataru to "Chuunibyou" to Soshirare, Shourai o Kataru to "Ishiki Takai" to Utomareru no ga Genjitsu Da yo ne?
夢を語ると「中二病」と誹られ, 将来を語ると「意識高い」と疎まれるのが現実だよね?

REGULAR.description:
The foursome of MILPOM, SILKY, CACAO and HAPPY challenge to make a character-themed lunch as it`s so popular today.  Their kyara-ben, be delicious!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Doesn`t Simply Watching Cooking Videos Make You Feel Like You`re a Master Chef?
Recipe Dougatte Miteru dake de Ryouri ga Umaku Natta Ki ga Suru yo ne?
レシピ動画って見てるだけで料理が上手くなった気がするよね?

REGULAR.description:
MILPOM, SILKY, CACAO and HAPPY hold a photo session in the woods, brandishing their smartphones.  While they`re totally into their shooting, HAPPY disappears all of a sudden. A certain doom falls on MILPOM and the others!  Can the four girls survive it!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Jibun no Roots toka Kangaehajimeru to Ichinichi ga 24 Jikan ja Tarinakunatte Kuru yo ne?
When You Start to Wonder About Your Roots, Is Thinking 24/7 Ever Enough?
自分のルーツとか考え始めると一日が24時間じゃ足りなくなってくるよね?

Shuurai no Yume: Happy Ver.
将来の夢 HAPPY ver.

Shuurai no Yume: Cocoa Ver.
将来の夢 CACAO ver.

Milpom
